means: 使人困惑的，令人费解的
使迷惑，使混乱( perplex的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: British Parliamentary procedure is perplexing at the best of times.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使在最好情况下，英国议会的程序也很费解。

sentence.Network_en: It took years to understand many perplexing diseases.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多疑难病症要耗时数年才能搞明白。

sentence.Network_en: This might seem very perplexing to those who know nothing about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 这对那些对它一无所知的人来说可能显得很难理解.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 综合英语二单词集 - 24小时学习网 ... saint n. 圣人 perplexing adj. 使人困惑的；令人费解的 emulation n. 竞争；效法.
perplexedly 困窘地perplexing 复杂的perplexity 纠缠
perpetuity 永久；永存物；年金perplexing 错综复杂的perplexity 困惑；纷乱；纠缠
...ed masters of communication make a mess of things?perplexing 令人困惑的jargon 术语

list.abs: a wide view his piece , we can see its artistic thought to turn into from " perplexed generation " to the " dauntless person son " spirit .纵观他的佳作，我们可以看到其创作思想是从“迷惘的一代”到“硬汉子”精神的演变。

by giving your conscious attention and devotion to the solution of a perplexing problem , your subconscious mind gathers all the necessary information and presents it full-blown to the conscious mind .通过将你的表意识的注意力全心投入于一个复杂问题的解决方案中，你的潜意识收集了所有的必要信息，并且全面将之呈送
for people interested in cetacean evolution the most perplexing problem always been : why are there so many species of [ beaked whale ] ?对于那些对鲸豚类进化感兴趣的人来说，最困扰的问题总是：为什么突吻鲸会有那么多的种类？
to make or become complex or perplexing ., 使复杂或令人困惑.

mental problem refers to the abnormal mental behavior . according to the severity , mental problem is divided into psychological perplexity , psychological obstacle and psychosis .心理问题是指各种心理及行为异常情形，通常把心理问题根据其严重程度，分为心理困扰、心理障碍和精神病。

entry.tran: 令人不解的；不知道如何处置的
entry.def: If you find something perplexing, you do not understand it or do not know how to deal with it.

example.ex: It took years to understand many perplexing diseases...
example.tran: 许多疑难病症要耗时数年才能搞明白。

example.ex: British Parliamentary procedure is perplexing at the best of times.
example.tran: 即使在最好情况下，英国议会的程序也很费解。

means.word_mean: 1. lacking clarity of meaning; causing confusion or perplexity;

sentences.sentence: "perplexing to someone who knew nothing about it"

auth_sentence.content: This work helped explain some perplexing phenomena engineers were encountering.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This work helped explain some perplexing phenomena engineers were encountering.

auth_sentence.content: They would not be anomalous or perplexing.
auth_sentence.res_content: They would not be anomalous or perplexing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They would not be anomalous or perplexing.

auth_sentence.content: This is a perplexing bundle of criticisms.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a perplexing bundle of criticisms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a perplexing bundle of criticisms.
